Save time and stay compliant

Meet your clients' legal, financial and tax needs faster with DocuSign for accounting and tax

Try DocuSign Free

 

Stop chasing paper

DocuSign enables accountants and tax specialists to get necessary signatures faster than ever, while still meeting strict legal requirements. Now you can turn around documents in hours—not days

Quick Demo

 

[[{"fid":"11861","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":false,"field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false},"type":"media","link_text":null,"field_deltas":{"2":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":false,"field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false}},"attributes":{"height":"165","width":"280","class":"media-element file-default","data-delta":"2"}}]]

 

 

Faster than faxing

Gain critical speed when deadlines are looming. DocuSign lets you send documents for electronic signature, saving time and hassle. No more waiting for clients to print PDFs, sign them, and then return them by fax or mail. With DocuSign, you can turn documents around in hours instead of days, so you can focus on client work instead of on tracking documents.

[[{"fid":"11866","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"Faster than faxing icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false},"type":"media","link_text":null,"field_deltas":{"3":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"Faster than faxing icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false}},"attributes":{"alt":"Faster than faxing icon","height":"258","width":"272","class":"media-element file-default","data-delta":"3"}}]]

 

 

 

[[{"fid":"11871","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"SSecure and private icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false},"type":"media","link_text":null,"field_deltas":{"4":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"SSecure and private icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false}},"attributes":{"alt":"SSecure and private icon","height":"275","width":"289","class":"media-element file-default","data-delta":"4"}}]]

Secure and private

Use secure authentication to protect you and your clients. With today’s rampant identity theft, we’re all concerned about privacy and security. Your customers want the assurance that their documents won’t be shared or stolen and that their signatures can’t be forged. DocuSign’s eSignature lets you send documents electronically, instead of leaving them sitting in the mail or on the fax machine. And our secure authentication helps protect against fraud.

 

 

 

Convenient for clients

Give your customers the modern experience they expect. DocuSign lets your clients receive and sign documents on their computers or mobile devices. The process is simple and streamlined, so you can provide your customers with the best service possible.

[[{"fid":"11876","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"Convenient for clients icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false},"type":"media","link_text":null,"field_deltas":{"5":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"Convenient for clients icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false}},"attributes":{"alt":"Convenient for clients icon","height":"275","width":"289","class":"media-element file-default","data-delta":"5"}}]]

 

 

 

[[{"fid":"11881","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"CCompliant with regulations icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false},"type":"media","link_text":null,"field_deltas":{"6":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":"CCompliant with regulations icon","field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false}},"attributes":{"alt":"CCompliant with regulations icon","height":"275","width":"289","class":"media-element file-default","data-delta":"6"}}]]

Compliant with regulations

Ensure that you and your clients are in compliance. Your business is all about saving your customers money while keeping them compliant with federal and provincial regulations. We meet ISO 27001 and SSAE 16 standards, and more. Plus, when you use DocuSign, your documents are saved electronically and retain an audit trail for added transparency.

 

 

Use cases

DocuSign can be used to send and sign many of the documents commonly required for tax and accounting purposes, including:

  • Personal tax forms (T183, Auth Rep, TP-1000, MR69...)
  • Corporate tax forms (T183Corp, CO1000, MR69…)
  • Asset purchase agreements
  • Confidentiality agreements
  • Engagement letters
  • Practice continuation agreements
  • Employment contracts
  • Power of attorney agreements
  • Independent contractor agreements

 

 

“With DocuSign, the entire process can be conducted seamlessly in the cloud—eliminating paper, hassles and wasted time. DocuSign is the final mile in completing the loan process.”

Karen Stroup, Vice President of Product Management for Intuit’s Professional Tax Group

Compliant with regulations

Ensure that you and your clients are in compliance. Your business is all about saving your customers money while keeping them compliant with federal and state regulations. We meet the latest IRS regulations, ISO 27001 and SSAE 16 standards, and more. Plus, when you use DocuSign, your documents are saved electronically and retain an audit trail for added transparency.

 

 

Use Cases

DocuSign can be used to send and sign many of the documents commonly required for tax and accounting purposes, including:

  • IRS-approved tax forms
  • LLC formation
  • Asset purchase agreements
  • Confidentiality agreements
  • Engagement letters
  • Practice continuation agreements
  • Employment contracts
  • Power of attorney agreements
  • Independent contractor agreements

 

 

Partner

[[{"fid":"11886","view_mode":"default","fields":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":false,"field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false},"type":"media","link_text":null,"field_deltas":{"7":{"format":"default","field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]":false,"field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]":false}},"attributes":{"height":"60","width":"209","class":"media-element file-default","data-delta":"7"}}]]

Use DocuSign with Intuit to send and sign tax documents

Save time during the busy tax season with secure electronic signing. Intuit has partnered with DocuSign to offer Intuit eSignature. Now, you can send and sign IRS Forms 8878 and 8879 electronically—right from your Intuit product. DocuSign ensures compliance with the latest IRS regulations for e-signing. And it helps prevent identity theft by securely sending encrypted documents and using authentication to verify the signer.

When you use Intuit eSignature , it’s faster and easier for you and your clients to sign tax documents. And DocuSign provides an audit trail and keeps a copy of every signed document, making it easier for you to follow up or to reference documents later.

Intuit eSignature
Intuit eSignature

“With DocuSign, the entire process can be conducted seamlessly in the cloud—eliminating paper, hassles and wasted time. DocuSign is the final mile in completing the loan process.”

Karen Stroup, Vice President of Product Management for Intuit’s Professional Tax Group
